admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of: (a) the laying
            of about 38 miles of sewer mains; (b) improvements to 5
            existing pumping stations and 3 sewage treatment works; (c)
            the construction of additional pumping stations and 4
            sewerage treatment works; and (d) consulting services.
